Class SiderealTime

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.physics.astronomy.time.SiderealTime
public class SiderealTime extends Object
Sidereal time calculations. Greenwich Mean Sidereal Time (GMST): Sidereal time at Greenwich meridian. Local Mean Sidereal Time (LMST): GMST adjusted for observer longitude. * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

    • lmstDegrees

      public static double lmstDegrees(JulianDate jd, double longitude)
      Computes Local Mean Sidereal Time in degrees.
      Parameters:
      jd - Julian Date
      longitude - Observer longitude in degrees (East positive)
      Returns:
      LMST in degrees [0, 360)

    • hourAngle

      public static double hourAngle(double lmstHours, double raHours)
      Computes Hour Angle for an object. HA = LMST - RA
      Parameters:
      lmstHours - Local sidereal time in hours
      raHours - Right ascension in hours
      Returns:
      Hour angle in hours (-12 to +12)
